entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greenwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 07:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of snow this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
